message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, let's try 3/4 to me and 1/4 to you
I'm not convinced by your offer, I'll make a counter-proposal: 50/50!
I'm willing to compromise, let's split it 55/45
I'll try to squeeze a bit more, 4/5 to me and 1/5 to you
I'm not comfortable with that big of a gap, I'll make a counter-proposal: 52/48!
I'm getting close to my limit, let's try 51/49
